ðŸ“– Summary: Runtime is a skills-based browser agent that interacts with Chromium-based browsers like Chrome and Edge. It utilizes predefined actions (skills) instead of direct DOM manipulation, resulting in faster and more reliable automation. This approach eliminates vendor lock-in and API dependencies, offering an efficient way to work with web applications.
